plot: The boys are trying to solve the fuel crisis since fuel prices gone up. Jeremy reviews the new Ferrari 430 Scuderia. The boys build their own police cars for less than a 1000 pounds.

The boys attempt to solve the fuel crisis since there is an increase in fuel prices. Jeremy road tests the new Ferrari 430 Scuderia. Top Gear Stuntman is introduced. The boys were given 1000 pounds each to buy a car and turn it into a police car.—snake6790
